include.description:
Additional fields to include in the response.
See the `include` parameter for listing Conversation items for more information.

items.description: The items to add to the conversation. You may add up to 20 items at a time.

Item.description: Content item used to generate a response.

type.description: The type of the message input. Always `message`.

role.description:
The role of the message input. One of `user`, `assistant`, `system`, or
  `developer`.

content.description:
Text, image, or audio input to the model, used to generate a response.
  Can also contain previous assistant responses.

EasyInputMessage.description:
A message input to the model with a role indicating instruction following
hierarchy. Instructions given with the `developer` or `system` role take
precedence over instructions given with the `user` role. Messages with the
`assistant` role are presumed to have been generated by the model in previous
interactions.
EasyInputMessage.title: Input message

type.description: The type of the message input. Always set to `message`.

role.description: The role of the message input. One of `user`, `system`, or `developer`.

status.description:
The status of item. One of `in_progress`, `completed`, or
  `incomplete`. Populated when items are returned via API.

InputMessage.description:
A message input to the model with a role indicating instruction following
hierarchy. Instructions given with the `developer` or `system` role take
precedence over instructions given with the `user` role.
InputMessage.title: Input message

type.description: The type of the computer tool call output. Always `computer_call_output`.

call_id.description: The ID of the computer tool call that produced the output.

ComputerCallOutputItemParam.description: The output of a computer tool call.
ComputerCallOutputItemParam.title: Computer tool call output

type.description: The type of the function tool call output. Always `function_call_output`.

call_id.description: The unique ID of the function tool call generated by the model.

output.description: Text, image, or file output of the function tool call.

FunctionCallOutputItemParam.description: The output of a function tool call.
FunctionCallOutputItemParam.title: Function tool call output

type.description: The type of the item. Always `compaction`.

encrypted_content.description: The encrypted content of the compaction summary.

CompactionSummaryItemParam.description: A compaction item generated by the [`v1/responses/compact` API](https://platform.openai.com/docs/api-reference/responses/compact).
CompactionSummaryItemParam.title: Compaction item

type.description: The type of the item. Always `shell_call`.

call_id.description: The unique ID of the shell tool call generated by the model.

action.description: The shell commands and limits that describe how to run the tool call.

FunctionShellCallItemParam.description: A tool representing a request to execute one or more shell commands.
FunctionShellCallItemParam.title: Shell tool call

type.description: The type of the item. Always `shell_call_output`.

call_id.description: The unique ID of the shell tool call generated by the model.

output.description: Captured chunks of stdout and stderr output, along with their associated outcomes.

FunctionShellCallOutputItemParam.description: The streamed output items emitted by a shell tool call.
FunctionShellCallOutputItemParam.title: Shell tool call output

type.description: The type of the item. Always `apply_patch_call`.

call_id.description: The unique ID of the apply patch tool call generated by the model.

status.description: The status of the apply patch tool call. One of `in_progress` or `completed`.

operation.description: The specific create, delete, or update instruction for the apply_patch tool call.

ApplyPatchToolCallItemParam.description: A tool call representing a request to create, delete, or update files using diff patches.
ApplyPatchToolCallItemParam.title: Apply patch tool call

type.description: The type of the item. Always `apply_patch_call_output`.

call_id.description: The unique ID of the apply patch tool call generated by the model.

status.description: The status of the apply patch tool call output. One of `completed` or `failed`.

ApplyPatchToolCallOutputItemParam.description: The streamed output emitted by an apply patch tool call.
ApplyPatchToolCallOutputItemParam.title: Apply patch tool call output

type.description: The type of the item. Always `mcp_approval_response`.

approval_request_id.description: The ID of the approval request being answered.

MCPApprovalResponse.description: A response to an MCP approval request.
MCPApprovalResponse.title: MCP approval response

type.description: The type of the output message. Always `message`.

id.description: The unique ID of the output message.

role.description: The role of the output message. Always `assistant`.

content.description: The content of the output message.

status.description:
The status of the message input. One of `in_progress`, `completed`, or
  `incomplete`. Populated when input items are returned via API.

ItemOutputMessage.description: An output message from the model.
ItemOutputMessage.title: Output message

type.description: The type of the file search tool call. Always `file_search_call`.

id.description: The unique ID of the file search tool call.

status.description:
The status of the file search tool call. One of `in_progress`,
  `searching`, `incomplete` or `failed`,

queries.description: The queries used to search for files.

ItemFileSearchToolCall.description:
The results of a file search tool call. See the
[file search guide](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/tools-file-search) for more information.
ItemFileSearchToolCall.title: File search tool call

type.description: The type of the computer call. Always `computer_call`.

id.description: The unique ID of the computer call.

call_id.description: An identifier used when responding to the tool call with output.

pending_safety_checks.description: The pending safety checks for the computer call.

status.description:
The status of the item. One of `in_progress`, `completed`, or
  `incomplete`. Populated when items are returned via API.

ItemComputerToolCall.description:
A tool call to a computer use tool. See the
[computer use guide](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/tools-computer-use) for more information.
ItemComputerToolCall.title: Computer tool call

type.description: The type of the web search tool call. Always `web_search_call`.

id.description: The unique ID of the web search tool call.

status.description: The status of the web search tool call.

action.description:
An object describing the specific action taken in this web search call.
  Includes details on how the model used the web (search, open_page, find).

ItemWebSearchToolCall.description:
The results of a web search tool call. See the
[web search guide](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/tools-web-search) for more information.
ItemWebSearchToolCall.title: Web search tool call

type.description: The type of the function tool call. Always `function_call`.

id.description: The unique ID of the function tool call.

call_id.description: The unique ID of the function tool call generated by the model.

name.description: The name of the function to run.

arguments.description: A JSON string of the arguments to pass to the function.

status.description:
The status of the item. One of `in_progress`, `completed`, or
  `incomplete`. Populated when items are returned via API.

ItemFunctionToolCall.description:
A tool call to run a function. See the
[function calling guide](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/function-calling) for more information.
ItemFunctionToolCall.title: Function tool call

type.description: The type of the object. Always `reasoning`.

id.description: The unique identifier of the reasoning content.

status.description:
The status of the item. One of `in_progress`, `completed`, or
  `incomplete`. Populated when items are returned via API.

ItemReasoningItem.description:
A description of the chain of thought used by a reasoning model while generating
a response. Be sure to include these items in your `input` to the Responses API
for subsequent turns of a conversation if you are manually
[managing context](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/conversation-state).
ItemReasoningItem.title: Reasoning

type.description: The type of the image generation call. Always `image_generation_call`.

id.description: The unique ID of the image generation call.

status.description: The status of the image generation call.

ItemImageGenToolCall.description: An image generation request made by the model.
ItemImageGenToolCall.title: Image generation call

type.description: The type of the code interpreter tool call. Always `code_interpreter_call`.

id.description: The unique ID of the code interpreter tool call.

status.description: The status of the code interpreter tool call. Valid values are `in_progress`, `completed`, `incomplete`, `interpreting`, and `failed`.

container_id.description: The ID of the container used to run the code.

ItemCodeInterpreterToolCall.description: A tool call to run code.
ItemCodeInterpreterToolCall.title: Code interpreter tool call

type.description: The type of the local shell call. Always `local_shell_call`.

id.description: The unique ID of the local shell call.

call_id.description: The unique ID of the local shell tool call generated by the model.

status.description: The status of the local shell call.

ItemLocalShellToolCall.description: A tool call to run a command on the local shell.
ItemLocalShellToolCall.title: Local shell call

type.description: The type of the local shell tool call output. Always `local_shell_call_output`.

id.description: The unique ID of the local shell tool call generated by the model.

output.description: A JSON string of the output of the local shell tool call.

ItemLocalShellToolCallOutput.description: The output of a local shell tool call.
ItemLocalShellToolCallOutput.title: Local shell call output

type.description: The type of the item. Always `mcp_list_tools`.

id.description: The unique ID of the list.

server_label.description: The label of the MCP server.

tools.description: The tools available on the server.

ItemMcpListTools.description: A list of tools available on an MCP server.
ItemMcpListTools.title: MCP list tools

type.description: The type of the item. Always `mcp_approval_request`.

id.description: The unique ID of the approval request.

server_label.description: The label of the MCP server making the request.

name.description: The name of the tool to run.

arguments.description: A JSON string of arguments for the tool.

ItemMcpApprovalRequest.description: A request for human approval of a tool invocation.
ItemMcpApprovalRequest.title: MCP approval request

type.description: The type of the item. Always `mcp_call`.

id.description: The unique ID of the tool call.

server_label.description: The label of the MCP server running the tool.

name.description: The name of the tool that was run.

arguments.description: A JSON string of the arguments passed to the tool.

status.description: The status of the tool call. One of `in_progress`, `completed`, `incomplete`, `calling`, or `failed`.

ItemMcpToolCall.description: An invocation of a tool on an MCP server.
ItemMcpToolCall.title: MCP tool call

type.description: The type of the custom tool call output. Always `custom_tool_call_output`.

id.description: The unique ID of the custom tool call output in the OpenAI platform.

call_id.description: The call ID, used to map this custom tool call output to a custom tool call.

output.description:
The output from the custom tool call generated by your code.
  Can be a string or an list of output content.

ItemCustomToolCallOutput.description: The output of a custom tool call from your code, being sent back to the model.
ItemCustomToolCallOutput.title: Custom tool call output

type.description: The type of the custom tool call. Always `custom_tool_call`.

id.description: The unique ID of the custom tool call in the OpenAI platform.

call_id.description: An identifier used to map this custom tool call to a tool call output.

name.description: The name of the custom tool being called.

input.description: The input for the custom tool call generated by the model.

ItemCustomToolCall.description: A call to a custom tool created by the model.
ItemCustomToolCall.title: Custom tool call

results.description: The results returned from the memory search.

InputMessageContentList.description:
A list of one or many input items to the model, containing different content
types.
InputMessageContentList.title: Input item content list

type.description:
Specifies the event type. For a computer screenshot, this property is
  always set to `computer_screenshot`.

image_url.description: The URL of the screenshot image.

file_id.description: The identifier of an uploaded file that contains the screenshot.

ComputerScreenshotImage.description: A computer screenshot image used with the computer use tool.

id.description: The ID of the pending safety check.

ComputerCallSafetyCheckParam.description: A pending safety check for the computer call.

type.description: The type of the input item. Always `input_text`.

text.description: The text input to the model.

InputTextContentParam.title: Input text

type.description: The type of the input item. Always `input_image`.

InputImageContentParamAutoParam.description: An image input to the model. Learn about [image inputs](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/vision)
InputImageContentParamAutoParam.title: Input image

type.description: The type of the input item. Always `input_file`.

InputFileContentParam.description: A file input to the model.
InputFileContentParam.title: Input file

commands.description: Ordered shell commands for the execution environment to run.

FunctionShellActionParam.title: Shell action

FunctionShellCallItemStatus.description: Status values reported for shell tool calls.
FunctionShellCallItemStatus.title: Shell call status

stdout.description: Captured stdout output for the shell call.

stderr.description: Captured stderr output for the shell call.

outcome.description: The exit or timeout outcome associated with this shell call.

FunctionShellCallOutputContentParam.description: Captured stdout and stderr for a portion of a shell tool call output.
FunctionShellCallOutputContentParam.title: Shell output content

ApplyPatchCallStatusParam.title: Apply patch call status

ApplyPatchCallOutputStatusParam.description: Outcome values reported for apply_patch tool call outputs.
ApplyPatchCallOutputStatusParam.title: Apply patch call output status

type.description: The action type.

sources.description: The sources used in the search.

WebSearchActionSearch.title: Search action

url.description: The URL opened by the model.

url.description: The URL of the page searched for the pattern.

pattern.description: The pattern or text to search for within the page.

WebSearchActionFind.description: Action type "find": Searches for a pattern within a loaded page.

logs.description: The logs output from the code interpreter.

url.description: The URL of the image output from the code interpreter.

CodeInterpreterOutputImage.title: Code interpreter output image

type.description: The type of the local shell action. Always `exec`.

env.description: Environment variables to set for the command.

input_schema.description: The JSON schema describing the tool's input.

type.description: The operation type. Always `create_file`.

path.description: Path of the file to create relative to the workspace root.

diff.description: Unified diff content to apply when creating the file.

type.description: The operation type. Always `delete_file`.

type.description: The type of the output text. Always `output_text`.

text.description: The text output from the model.

annotations.description: The annotations of the text output.

OutputMessageContentOutputTextContent.title: Output text

type.description: The type of the refusal. Always `refusal`.

refusal.description: The refusal explanation from the model.

VectorStoreFileAttributes.description:
Set of 16 key-value pairs that can be attached to an object. This can be
useful for storing additional information about the object in a structured
format, and querying for objects via API or the dashboard. Keys are strings
with a maximum length of 64 characters. Values are strings with a maximum
length of 512 characters, booleans, or numbers.

type.description: Specifies the event type. For a click action, this property is always `click`.

button.description: Indicates which mouse button was pressed during the click. One of `left`, `right`, `wheel`, `back`, or `forward`.

x.description: The x-coordinate where the click occurred.

y.description: The y-coordinate where the click occurred.

type.description: Specifies the event type. For a double click action, this property is always set to `double_click`.

x.description: The x-coordinate where the double click occurred.

y.description: The y-coordinate where the double click occurred.

type.description:
Specifies the event type. For a drag action, this property is
  always set to `drag`.

path.description:
An array of coordinates representing the path of the drag action. Coordinates will appear as an array
  of objects, eg
  ```
  [
    { x: 100, y: 200 },
    { x: 200, y: 300 }
  ]
  ```

type.description: Specifies the event type. For a keypress action, this property is always set to `keypress`.

keys.description: The combination of keys the model is requesting to be pressed. This is an array of strings, each representing a key.

KeyPressAction.description: A collection of keypresses the model would like to perform.
KeyPressAction.title: KeyPress

type.description:
Specifies the event type. For a move action, this property is
  always set to `move`.

Specifies the event type. For a screenshot action, this property is
  always set to `screenshot`.

Specifies the event type. For a scroll action, this property is
  always set to `scroll`.

x.description: The x-coordinate where the scroll occurred.

y.description: The y-coordinate where the scroll occurred.

type.description:
Specifies the event type. For a type action, this property is
  always set to `type`.

Type.description: An action to type in text.
Type.title: Type

type.description:
Specifies the event type. For a wait action, this property is
  always set to `wait`.

detail.description: The detail level of the image to be sent to the model. One of `high`, `low`, or `auto`. Defaults to `auto`.

FunctionAndCustomToolCallOutputInputImag.title: Input image

filename.description: The name of the file to be sent to the model.

file_data.description: The content of the file to be sent to the model.

FunctionAndCustomToolCallOutputInputFile.title: Input file

scope.description: The namespace that logically groups and isolates memories, such as a user ID.

updated_at.description: The last update time of the memory item.

scope.description: The namespace that logically groups and isolates memories, such as a user ID.

type.description: The type of the file citation. Always `file_citation`.

filename.description: The filename of the file cited.

end_index.description: The index of the last character of the URL citation in the message.
